author: dspicar
msg: CLEREZZA-606: First version of CRIS monitoring tool. Collects data and displays it in a table. Allows to specify a threshold and an action taken when reaching the threshold (action consists of a HTTP GET request on a specified web resource).

author: marrs
msg: ACE-164 Caught the special condition that occurred. If a target is not registered, it will for now simply not show up in the list. As a side effect, unregistered targets that simply show up because they polled the server for now are invisible in the REST interface.

author: struberg
msg: skelleton for the Maven ExceptionUtils impl
